statements: DELETE FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_symbol = 'AAPL' AND trade_volume < 1000;
DELETE FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_symbol = 'AAPL' AND trade_volume > 1000;
DELETE FROM trade_patterns WHERE pattern_name = 'Trend Reversal';
DELETE FROM historical_trades WHERE trade_id = 100 AND trade_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM trade_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 2, 3);
DELETE FROM trades WHERE trade_id = 100 AND trade_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM trades WHERE trade_id = 100 AND trade_date < '2022-01-01';
